sources: ⟦s000088⟧ This TERM LOAN CREDIT AGREEMENT is entered into as of December 29, 2023, among LANDS’ END, INC. , a Delaware corporation (the “ Borrower ”), each Person from time to time party hereto as a lender (collectively, the “ Lenders ” and individually, a “ Lender ”) and BLUE TORCH FINANCE LLC , as administrative agent and collateral agent.
⟦s000797⟧ As of the Closing Date, the aggregate principal amount of the Term Loan Commitments is $260,000,000.
⟦s000951⟧ Term Loans may be Base Rate Loans or SOFR Loans as further provided herein.

```markdown
| Pricing level | Total Leverage Ratio | Base Rate Loans | SOFR Loans |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| I | ≥ 2.75 to 1.00 | 7.25% | 8.25% |
| II | < 2.75 to 1.00 and ≥ 2.25 to 1.00 | 7.00% | 8.00% |
| III | < 2.25 to 1.00 | 6.75% | 7.75% |
```

⟦s000495⟧ “ Maturity Date ” means with respect to any Term Loans, the date that is five years after the Closing Date; provided that if any such day is not a Business Day, the Maturity Date shall be the Business Day immediately preceding such day.
⟦s000301⟧ “ Dollars ” and “ $ ” mean lawful money of the United States.
⟦s000392⟧ “ Floor ” means a rate of interest equal to 2.00% per annum.
⟦s001100⟧ The Borrower shall pay to the Agent an upfront fee in Dollars on the Closing Date in an amount equal to 3.
